attributes.action: thank the pm for service to the country ,jobs ,minimum wage.tax credit ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i believe apart from iraq which we have to one way or another support our allies
the pm has done a great job and i wish him well in future life on  behalf of a generation who were left with no future
or hope under mrs thatcher which i hope voters remember that unemployment wasnt a subject to vote about. times change .thanks tony for your leadership

rejection.details: We will pass on your kind words, but you can't really petition the Prime Minister to thank himself!
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
